body_html:
it seems to make sense to me to get rid of persistent=False as an option altogether and just use persistent when possible, and switch to slower algorithms when not possible.
What do you think?
What's the advantage of keeping a persistent kwarg?

body:
it seems to make sense to me to get rid of `persistent=False` as an option altogether and just use persistent when possible, and switch to slower algorithms when not possible.
What do you think?
What's the advantage of keeping a `persistent` kwarg?
